data.taskTitle: Add template preview in Variables Step
Add template preview in Variables Step
data.approach: Add a $derived preview that uses substituteVariables() to show real-time template content as user fills in form fields. Will add a collapsible preview section below the variables form with styled markdown-like rendering.

data.taskTitle: Add template preview in Variables Step
summary: Added $derived templatePreview that uses substituteVariables() for real-time content
Added collapsible Preview section with eye icon and Live badge
Preview shows template with variables substituted as user types
Unfilled variables highlighted in yellow with warning color styling
HTML properly escaped to prevent XSS before highlighting is applied

filesModified.description: Added preview state, derived HTML, and collapsible preview UI section

reviewFocus: Preview updates in real-time as user fills in variable form fields

summary: Added live template preview with variable substitution
Collapsible UI with eye icon and Live badge
XSS-safe rendering with unfilled variable highlighting
